inclusion.criterion: COVID-19 positive and respiratory failure requiring intubation
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: came to the hospital with high blood pressure (175/95 mmHg) and signs of septicemia, developed respiratory failure requiring mechanical ventilation

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: blood tests revealed elevated lactate dehydrogenase and reduced human complement C3 levels with a normal coagulation profile

exclusion.criterion: inability to tolerate enteral feeds, ileus, gastrointestinal bleeding
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids

exclusion.criterion: known fatty acid oxidation disorder or pyruvate carboxylase deficiency
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine.
